announcement_body.headline: Introducing Largo and Patch 7.40
announcement_body.body:
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3703047/c09b13cda87a548b83b626fb33a32efd7895c634.png[/img]

Dota is an ensemble cast, but keen observers looking through the collection of rogues, wizards, druids, and knights (not to mention two characters [i]named[/i] "ranger") may have noticed the absence of that most maligned of hero classes: the bard. At least, up until now.

Introducing Dota's newest hero: Largo, the bard.

Unlike bards with your traditional bard powers (singing about current events and chord changes), Largo is the shamanic head of the bardmonk order. He tailors every song to his exact circumstances, raising his allies' spirits or, if necessary, their foot speed as they run toward battle (or away). As a frog, his prehensile tongue has, shall we say, all kinds of tricks. You can [url=http://dota2.com/largocomic]read a little about his past[/url], or you can help explore his future in Dota right now.

Today's update also includes [url=https://dota2.com/largo]gameplay patch 7.40[/url]. (As is tradition, the patch notes are too long to fit in this blog, so we made a whole site to hold them and show some highlights.)

Largo is taking over the main menu in Dota for a bit, but the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34827959]Monster Hunter[/url] event is still ongoing and there's plenty of time left to craft whatever you're working towards. Since it's the holidays, we're putting the [url=https://www.dota2.com/newsentry/555756515113304416]Dota 2 x Monster Hunter[/url] Expedition Pack on sale and granting everyone who owned it already a special early-purchase voucher material bundle. On top of that, we're giving [i]everyone[/i] who logs in over the holidays a free bundle of crafting materials. Happy hunting!

Speaking of holiday festivities, some of the usual shenanigans have made their reappearance, reminding us all of the true spirit of the holidays: pelting your enemies in the face with snowballs.

We hope everybody in the Dota community has a safe and happy holiday, and we'll see you next year.

events.event_name: The International 2026 Live Event Broadcast RFP and Broadcast License Requests

localized_summary: Companies interested in producing and distributing regional language broadcasts of The International 2026 are encouraged to apply now.
The International 2026의 현지 언어 방송 제작 및 배포에 관심이 있는 기업은 지금부터 신청하실 수 있습니다.
Queremos animar a las empresas que estén interesadas en la producción y distribución de retransmisiones regionales de The International 2026 en diferentes idiomas a que envíen su solicitud.
有意向制作和转播2026年国际邀请赛直播的公司可以从即日起提出申请。
As empresas interessadas em produzir e distribuir transmissões regionais do International 2026 em determinados idiomas devem efetuar o requerimento agora.
Selskaper som er interesserte i å produsere og distribuere regionale sendinger av The International 2026 på forskjellige språk, oppfordres til å søke nå.
A The International 2026 regionális nyelvű közvetítése és terjesztése iránt érdeklődő társaságokat arra bátorítjuk, hogy jelentkezzenek most.
Invitamos a las compañías interesadas en producir y distribuir retransmisiones regionales de The International 2026 en distintos idiomas a que envíen su solicitud.

announcement_body.headline: The International 2026 Live Event Broadcast RFP and Broadcast License Requests
announcement_body.body:
The International returns to Shanghai, China in August 2026, and we’d like to invite all companies interested in producing and distributing regional language broadcasts of The International 2026 to apply now.  

For the Live Event Broadcast Production of this year's show, we’ll be accepting proposals for Russian and Spanish language broadcast partners. The RFP (Request For Proposal) documentation and instructions for submissions can be found [url=https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/apps/dota2/assets/RFP_TI_2026.pdf]here[/url].   
 
For those seeking additional licenses and feeds, please fill out the form below that pertains to the correct request: 

[list]
[*]Production companies seeking a commercial license to produce a regional language broadcast of The International 2026 without additional access to the event can apply[url=https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdT8MilI4gsOduPisCXQPZiTH_VoXTNhXMoYvnYUBjPl-neIw/viewform] here[/url]. 

[*]Streaming platforms interested in restreaming the official broadcast feeds to their platform can apply [url=https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScpIiTAWg-oT2cT8lSeONoReY1iK0Vu4A5WuDVGOSk-K-a22w/viewform]here[/url].[/list]

Fans interested in trying their own hands at casting are welcome to create strictly noncommercial casts from DotaTV that follow the [url=https://www.dota2.com/dotatv]Dota 2 Community Streaming License[/url], and do not need to make an official request. 

Please reach out to theinternationalrfp@valvesoftware.com with any additional questions.  

Thanks in advance to everyone interested in working with us to bring The International 2026 to life.

announcement_body.headline: Dota x Monster Hunter
announcement_body.body:
[img src="{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3703047/98be0d0a60eca8edbad91ec0050918f83ea462e2.png"][/img]

[p]It's open season on the world's most dangerous heroes, and you're just the hero we need to track them all down. We're happy to announce a massive Dota/[url="https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34827959"]Monster Hunter[/url] crossover with new sets, new pets, a new in-game hunt and crafting system, and of course monsters. (For everyone who thinks Dragon Knight turning into a dragon is awesome but would be [i]more[/i] awesome if he turned into Rathalos instead, great news: Capcom was just as excited as we were to make this happen).[/p]
[p]There are six Monster Hunter-themed item sets to collect in all, each bringing a classic Monster Hunter armor set into the Dota world, and each with three craftable alternate versions. There's also a new Palico courier with craftable costumes, and even your very own pet Poogie with craftable outfits. Your Poogie will hang out in your base, waiting to give you love whenever you return (and, assuming he is house trained, not pooping on your base).[/p]
[p]The core version of each hero set is available to all Dota players for free, and can be crafted once you've harvested the necessary materials from hero hunts. In addition, the Hero Atlas will help you track your progress, explore hero lore, and gather dispatches from the farthest realms, penned by Axe's loyal scribe Goodkind.[/p]
[p]For those that want more, the Expedition Pack includes more of everything: usable Monster Hunter monsters (Rathalos for Dragon Knight and the Bullfango for Beastmaster), a Monster Hunter music pack and seasonal spray collection, and a bundle of crafting materials to get you started. Expedition Pack holders can also craft exclusive Poogie, Palico, and hero set variants with custom ambient and Immortal effects.[/p]
[p]The hunt is on, and will run for the next three months. Get in the game, vanquish your enemies, and transform your victories into new items. Oh, and look out for monsters.[/p]
